name: Webicules Technology
tagline: Web Applications, Mobile Apps, Digital Marketing
description:
Webicules Technology is a IT software design and development company that provides end-to-end service for web and mobile application development & support. We work on a wide range of latest technologies right from open source to proprietary and custom-built systems or solutions.
We have successfully delivered over 500 projects for clients spread across geographies. Our clients include startups, MSME (micro, small and medium enterprises), and large MNCs.
With our Global Development Centre (GDC) located in New Delhi, India, we offer 2x faster time to market and over 50% competitive savings on expertise including but not limited to the following services:
Web Application Development
Mobile Application Development
Enterprise Application Management
Digital Marketing
Cloud Implementation
Startups and Incubation Support
